title: Mouse keeps disconnecting
body: My logitech g602 wireless mouse keeps disconnecting for around 5 seconds randomly. This only occurs when I am playing League and I have tried using different USB ports, new batteries and updating firmware. My mouse is around 3 years old and this problem has just recently come up. Any help would be appreciated thanks.

replies.body: Your mouse may have gone bad at this point and losing connection to your PC.  YOU may need to try another mouse entirely to rule out any possibilities.  Let me know if you can give that a shot, and the results.
Sorry for the late reply but I ended up getting a new mouse and it works perfect thanks for the help!
